name: Love☆Ringo
description:
Slow to load, please be patient yYou may need to refresh the page once.~

  • You'll find some items simply do not fit together, I apologise but it can't be helped.
  • All items in the ???mystery tab can be removed on the tab that corresponds to what item they are. i.e. the scarf can be removed on the ACC tab! 

This is a fanwork for Uta no Prince-sama I'm not making any money from this please don't sue me
